reviewText: bruce has a good way of teaching  a very good aid to understanding the bible

Four short lessons using John Chapter15 to inspire everyone to move on to greater spirituality with God.

If Bruce Wilkinson writes or develops it - read, a man greatly gifted with ability to inspire people to serve God more fully.

Four Session about a hour's worth including the DVD and then discussion question. Have used this DVD & book in numerous settings results always the same - everybody enjoyed and felt they needed to go further in their Christian Walk.
